root: ^How are the repairs going along? Do you need my help with anything?
^I'm almost done, but can you just pass me the blue silk there, please?
^Okay and... done! Here's your dress Yuki!
^Wow! It's even prettier than I remember! You're amazing, Makra!
^It was the least I could do... after you gave me so much money to buy the supplies in the first place.
^Well since you did repair this dress, you deserve to hear what I wished for!
^I'm in no rush Yuki, you don't have to tell it if you don't want to do it now.
^But I want to! I've been dying to tell you my wish since I made it!
^It's a simple wish, but it will change my life for the better if it comes true!
^Well I hope it does come true... so what is it?
^I simply want you to accept this ring and say yes I do!
^Yuki! is that... a ring?! Are you proposing to me?
^Yes! Makra would you give me the honour to stay by my side always, for the better and for the worse?
^I love you Makra! I want us to be happy forever!
^I can't wait! I love you too Yuki!  I didn't want to tell you but... my wish was also for me to stay by your side...
